title: I've written a (short) screenplay. I'd like to turn it into a (short) film. Where do I even start? - Quora

response.answer_text: I'd say the first step is to work out what your budget is. Then you can see what you can afford in terms of cast and crew. Then it's time to start hiring, rehearsing and scouting for locations. Check out Mandy.com and see if there are any crew available in your area.
